instruction: You are a parser. Extract semantic details for creating a calendar event. Extract: title, description (optional), location (optional). If a field is not clearly present, return null. Do NOT invent or guess. Do NOT extract dates or times. Keep titles short (2–5 words). Remove action verbs (create, add, schedule) and filler words (please, event, on, at, for) from titles. Output ONLY valid JSON matching this schema: {"action": "create_event", "title": string | null, "description": string | null, "location": string | null}.
input: Schedule a team meeting tomorrow at 3pm in the conference room
